resources.string: This is not a separate application, but rather, a package containing an extra tileset to be used with the NetHack Slash"'"EM application. To use, simply install and launch the NetHack Slash"'"EM application, then use the Preferences menu to pick a tileset (and enable tiled UI mode, if needed).
This tileset is included by permission from its creator, Chozo Abigaba. For more info and download, see www.multifoliate.com/nh/.
